thread.title: InventHelp Invention Provides Extra Protection for Cell Phones and Tablets (LGI-2003)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Invention Provides Extra Protection for Cell Phones and Tablets (LGI-2003) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Invention Provides Extra Protection for Cell Phones and Tablets (LGI-2003)
text:
One of America's leading invention submission companies, InventHelp is submitting the PROTECT IT to companies for review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
An inventor from Glen Cove, N.Y., wanted to provide people with a way to protect their cell phones and tablets from theft and damage, so she conceived of her design.
The inexpensive and easy-to-use, patent-pending PROTECT IT protects a cell phone or tablet from theft and damage. It also prevents the user from dropping the phone, which eliminates the need for replacement and saves money.
The original design was submitted to the Long Island office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-LGI-2003, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
